author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Jiangsu Xinquan Automotive Trim to pay A shares div for FY 2017 on May 2
text:
Jiangsu Xinquan Automotive Trim Co Ltd :
* Says it will pay cash dividend of 0.50 yuan(before tax)/share and use additional paid-in capital to distribute 0.40 new shares per share for 2017 to shareholders of record on April 27
* The companyâ€™s shares will be traded ex-right and ex-dividend on May 2 and the dividend will be paid on May 2
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/2bQ2rZ
